main_features.name: Web Scraping Engine
main_features.description: Scrapes the index of EU funding opportunities and extracts detailed data about each call.

main_features.name: Database Management
main_features.description: Manages a PostgreSQL database to store and retrieve convocation data efficiently.

main_features.name: API Endpoints
main_features.description: Provides RESTful API endpoints for accessing and manipulating convocation data.

main_features.name: Dashboard
main_features.description: Displays real-time status, scraping statistics, and a list of relevant convocations.

corrective_actions.description: Fix the import error in app/main.py by ensuring all dependencies are correctly installed and referenced.
